lead_paragraph: STEIN--Michael, my partner, friend and confidant. You inspired us to be the best of the best and to serve our clients with character, intellect, passion, reason and all of our professional skills. You pioneered the art of Financial Planning and the Financial Advocacy of our clients' interests. You left behind a great firm ready and able to continue your work of over 45 years. We will remember you and you will live in our hearts and minds. Bill and Jeannie Aaron and family David, Stephen, Jenny and Julie
